Paracetamol

Paracetamol, in correct therapeutic doses, has analgesic and antipyretic properties probably due to its direct effect on the hypothalamus.

Paracetamol, or acetaminophen, is available under many brand names and as generic preparations in the market. It is also available as preparations combined with caffeine (up to 50 mg/unit), codeine (60mg), and dextropropoxyphene.
